label: Wet Lab Validation
description: Generate experimental plans and validation protocols for wet lab testing.

defaultOutputs.name: Plan ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Unique identifier for the experimental plan (e.g. "EXP-001").

defaultOutputs.name: Plan Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Name or title of the experimental plan (e.g. "Experimental Plan (Minimal ver)").

defaultOutputs.name: Plan Type
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Type of experimental plan document (e.g. "Experimental Plan PDF").

defaultOutputs.name: Reference URL
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL link to access or download the experimental plan document.

configSchema.label: Experimental Requirements
configSchema.tooltip: Enter the experimental validation requirements or upload a file containing the requirements. This will be used to generate the experimental plan.
